title: Enthral
content:
Enthral Level 2 Enchantment Spell Reduce a creature's peripheral vision and make it look at you. 10 turns 6m Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Enchantment Spell

Reduce a creature's peripheral vision and make it look at you.

Enthral (Enthrall) is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Enthral is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Enthral Information
